emails.subject: Your latest updates from Career Help and Spaces!
emails.summary: The email is providing updates from Career Help and Spaces regarding the latest job opportunities on Braintrust, as well as a tip explaining the meaning of 'Invited by client'.
emails.body: Hello, we have new job updates from Career Help and Spaces on Braintrust. This week, there are 5 positions suited to your profile...

emails.subject: Monthly Activity Statement for July 2025
emails.summary: The email is a general update regarding the availability of the Monthly Activity Statement for July 2025 for account U***61014.
emails.body: Dear user, your monthly activity statement is now available for July 2025. Please log in to your account to view or download your statement.

emails.subject: “Software Engineer”: Opsfleet - AI Engineer and more
emails.summary: The email contains job alerts for three different positions: AI Engineer at Opsfleet, Software Engineer at GYPR, and AI/ML Developer at Hustlr.
emails.body: We’ve found roles that match your profile: AI Engineer at Opsfleet, Software Engineer at GYPR, AI/ML Developer at Hustlr. Click below to apply.

emails.subject: The Rope Split Ring — Now in two new styles
emails.summary: Email from Craighill announcing the release of two new styles of their Rope Split Ring product.
emails.body: Introducing new styles of the Rope Split Ring in Black & White and Long Slate Gray. Limited time offer inside!

emails.subject: Microsoft, Zone&Co. and others are hiring in Prague. Apply Now.
emails.summary: This email is a promotional email informing about job hiring opportunities in Prague by Microsoft, Zone&Co., and others.
emails.body: Don’t miss this hiring wave in Prague. Microsoft and more are looking for remote-ready professionals. Apply today.

emails.subject: Suspicious login attempt detected
emails.summary: Security alert: a login attempt was made to your account from an unrecognized device.
emails.body: We noticed a login attempt from Berlin, Germany. If this wasn’t you, please reset your password immediately.

categories.name: max
categories.description: all the other emails with low importance
